author: Linda Collison
content:
Set adrift to steer its own course
A worthy sailboat returns to shore

author: Willy
content: RIP sailor. You died doing what you loved. Being free at sea.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
I humbly quote Robert E Browne

A sailor’s death on ships of sleep
With few to know and none to weep
For faith so brave, a soul to keep
A silent grave in oceans deep.

RIP and my condolences to his friends and family
